description: System-generated unique identifier for this service class record.
Date and time the record was created or last modified; stored with millisecond precision. Confirm whether it tracks creation only or latest update.
Code indicating seasonal applicability of this class (e.g., which season is active or if seasonal rules apply); confirm code set and semantics.
Human-readable label for the season code; confirm lookup source.
Reference code linking this class to an asset category/type used across the fleet.
Display name for the associated asset category; likely from a lookup; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the maintenance class applied to assets; used to drive service schedules and policies, with details described in the comments field.
Free-text description of the maintenance class, typically indicating weight ranges (GVW) or special vehicle categories.
Identifier of the equivalent record in the prior system to support migration or cross-reference.
Name of the legacy source table where the corresponding record originated.
